org.locationtech.geowave.analytic.sample

Class BahmanEtAlSampleProbabilityFn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.analytic.sample.BahmanEtAlSampleProbabilityFn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SampleProbabilityFn

    public class BahmanEtAlSampleProbabilityFn
extends Object
implements SampleProbabilityFn
    l * d^2(y,C)/phi_x(C) y is some point, C is a set of centroids and l is an oversampling factor. As documented in section 3.3 in

    Bahmani, Kumar, Moseley, Vassilvitskii and Vattani. Scalable K-means++. VLDB Endowment Vol. 5, No. 7. 2012.
